segments.text: Can your dog do any tricks ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure he can . He can shake hands , roll over , and even play dead .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I wish I had a dog . My cat can't do any tricks .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah , but sometimes Bingo wants to play with me , but I don't have time .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: So who takes care of him then ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: My little brother likes to play with him . He even gives him a bath every week .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I can't do that with my cat . She hates water .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You know , you're right . Maybe you should get a dog .
segments.speaker: S2
